contract.name: CertBoard
contract.desc:
Certification Board servers as decentralized registrar for certificates to build trust in
    the node running capabilities of an entity.
    It supports issuing of attestations according to applicable node running standards by any entity.
    Moreover, it supports generation of on-chain produced proofs of an entity's node running
    capabilities through self-initiated stress tests, which get recorded as another certificate type.

    Global state
    ------------

    pla_manager : Account
        Platform manager account.

    expected_consensus_rate : UInt64
        Expected consensus reward rate.
        Expressed as percentage per year.

    certificate_fee : UInt64
        Fee charged by the platform for issuing of a certificate by anyone.
        Note: MBR increase is paid separately.
    stress_test_fee_round : UInt64
        Amount charged per round of the stress test.
    payment_asset : UInt64
        Payment method for the stress test and certificate fee.

    max_test_duration : UInt64
        Maximum allowed duration for a stress test.
    max_test_blocking : UInt64
        Maximum amount of rounds allowed to reserve for a stress test.

    stake_min : UInt64
        Minimum stake allowed to be used for a stress test.
    stake_max : UInt64
        Maximum stake allowed to be used for a stress test.

    blocked_algo: UInt64
        Amount of ALGO currently blocked and awaiting to be used in started stress test(s) requests.

    state : Bytes
        State of the contract. Can be one of the following:
            DEPLOYED - CertBoard has been created.
            LIVE - CertBoard is live.

    Methods
    -------
    cert_board_deploy(
    ) -> arc4.UInt64:
        Creates a new CertBoard.

    cert_board_key_reg(
        key_reg_info: KeyRegTxnInfo,
        txn: gtxn.PaymentTransaction,
    ) -> None:
        Issues a key (de)registration transaction by the platform.

    cert_board_set(
        pla_manager: arc4.Address,
        expected_consensus_rate: UInt64,
        certificate_fee: UInt64,
        stress_test_fee_round: UInt64,
        payment_asset: UInt64,
        max_test_duration: UInt64,
        max_test_blocking: UInt64,
        stake_min: UInt64,
        stake_max: UInt64,
    ) -> None:
        Sets platform parameters (anew).

    cert_board_optin_asa(
        asa: Asset,
        sender: Account,
        txn: gtxn.PaymentTransaction,
    ) -> None:
        Opts the platform address in to an ASA.

    cert_board_withdraw(
        amount: UInt64,
        asset_id: UInt64,
    ) -> None:
        Platform owner withdraws amount of asset from the platform.

    cert_create(
        recipient: arc4.Address,
        info: CertInfo,
        mbr_txn: gtxn.PaymentTransaction,
        txn: gtxn.Transaction,
    ) -> None:
        An issuer creates a certificate stored on the platform.

    cert_get(
        recipient: arc4.Address,
        issuer: arc4.Address,
    ) -> CertInfo:
        Returns the certificate issued by issuer to the recipient.

    stress_create(
        stake: UInt64,
        duration: UInt64,
        round_end_max: UInt64,
        algo_txn: gtxn.PaymentTransaction,
        txn: gtxn.Transaction,
    ) -> arc4.UInt64:
        Creates a stress test.

    stress_end(
        user_address: arc4.Address,
        stress_test_id: UInt64,
    ) -> None:
        Ends a stress test.

    stress_get(
        recipient: arc4.Address,
        stress_test_id: UInt64,
    ) -> StressTestInfo:
        Gets information about a successfully finished stress test.

    stress_record(
        user_address: arc4.Address,
        stress_test_id: UInt64,
    ) -> None:
        Records a produced block of during the stress test.

    stress_start(
        stress_test_id: UInt64,
        key_reg_info: KeyRegTxnInfo,
    ) -> None:
        Starts a created test.

    stress_unused(
        user_address: arc4.Address,
        stress_test_id: UInt64,
    ) -> None:
        Ends a not used stress test.

returns.desc: App ID of the created application.

methods.name: cert_board_key_reg

args.name: key_reg_info
args.desc: Key registration information to send.

args.name: txn
args.desc: Payment transaction to cover costs for the key (de)registration fee.

methods.desc: Issues a key (de)registration transaction by the platform.

args.name: pla_manager
args.desc: Platform manager account.

args.name: expected_consensus_rate
args.desc: Expected consensus reward rate. Expressed as percentage per year.

args.name: certificate_fee
args.desc: Fee charged by the platform for issuing of a certificate by anyone. Note: MBR increase is paid separately.

args.name: stress_test_fee_round
args.desc: Amount charged per round of the stress test.

args.name: payment_asset
args.desc: Payment method for the stress test and certificate fee.

args.name: max_test_duration
args.desc: Maximum allowed duration for a stress test.

args.name: max_test_blocking
args.desc: Maximum amount of rounds allowed to reserve for a stress test.

args.name: stake_min
args.desc: Minimum stake allowed to be used for a stress test.

args.name: stake_max
args.desc: Maximum stake allowed to be used for a stress test.

methods.name: cert_board_optin_asa

args.name: asa
args.desc: Asset to opt into.

args.name: sender
args.desc: Account to opt into the asa.

args.name: txn
args.desc: Payment transaction to cover MBR increase.

methods.desc: Opts the platform address in to an ASA.

methods.name: cert_board_withdraw

args.name: amount
args.desc: Amount to withdraw from the platform.

args.name: asset_id
args.desc: ID of the asset to withdraw, i.e. ASA ID or 0 for ALGO.

methods.desc: Platform owner withdraws amount of asset from the platform.

methods.name: cert_create

args.name: recipient
args.desc: Recipient of the certificate.

args.name: info
args.desc: Information to be recorded in the certificate.

args.name: mbr_txn
args.desc: Payment transaction for the payment of the increase of platform MBR due to creation of the certificate.

args.name: txn
args.desc: Transaction for the payment of the certificate issuance fee.

methods.desc: An issuer creates a certificate stored on the platform.

methods.name: cert_get

args.name: recipient
args.desc: Recipient of the certificate.

args.name: issuer
args.desc: Issuer of the certificate.

methods.desc: Returns the certificate issued by issuer to the recipient.

args.name: stake
args.desc: Amount of stake used in the stress test. The value is expressed in microALGO.

args.name: duration
args.desc: Number of rounds for the stress test. The actual duration of the block recording is 320 rounds shorter due to consensus trailing.

args.name: duration_max
args.desc: Maximum number of rounds allocated for the test, i.e. blocking of funds. This is to take into account key generation time after the stress testing contract has been created.

args.name: algo_txn
args.desc: Payment transaction for the payment of: 1) the increase of platform MBR due to creation of the stress test, 2) the fee for making the stress test contract opt-in to rewards with later key reg, and 3) the fee charged for the potential loss of platforms consensus rewards due to the stress test.

args.name: txn
args.desc: Transaction for the payment of the stress test fee.

args.name: user_address
args.desc: Address of the user that initiated the stress test.

args.name: stress_test_id
args.desc: App ID of the stress test to end.

methods.name: stress_get

args.name: recipient
args.desc: Recipient of the certificate.

args.name: stress_test_id
args.desc: App ID of the stress test to end.

methods.desc: Gets information about a successfully finished stress test.

methods.name: stress_record

args.name: user_address
args.desc: Address of the user that initiated the stress test.

args.name: stress_test_id
args.desc: App ID of the stress test to end.

methods.desc: Records a produced block of during the stress test.

args.name: stress_test_id
args.desc: App ID of the stress test to end.

args.name: mbr_txn
args.desc: Payment transaction for the payment of the increase of platform MBR due to creation of the box to record the stress test.

methods.name: stress_unused

args.name: user_address
args.desc: Address of the user that initiated the stress test.

args.name: stress_test_id
args.desc: App ID of the stress test to end.

methods.desc: Ends a not used stress test.
